name: L'Antichambre
description:
"Ouch, my head hurts
- Where am I ?
- Hello ?"
...
"Man, am I thursty
- Hellooo ?
- Can I at least get a glass of water, please ?"

---------------------------------------------------

L'Antichambre is a Kafkian roguelike adventure, in homage to the 1997 horror movie, "Cube". Made for the 7drl Challenge
by @FishTaod
